description_0: An indoor medium shot view of a children's play area with blue and cream colored poster buildings. On top of the cream colored building there is a red horse with wings flying over it, behind it there is a clear glass making the inside of the playground visible. On the left side there is a cream colored wall with a hole cut in the middle and attached to it there is a blue slide leading to the dark gray colored tiled floor. There is a tower slightly visible on the right and there is a cage around the top of the tower.
description_1: A medium view of a wall with a photo of the Empire State Building, printed on the wall. A glare is in the top right corner of the print, caused by the ceiling light. Below is a print of two apartment buildings facing each other. They have a reddish-brown wall with multiple windows covering the entire walls. A bright yellow and white light are reflecting on the wall by an LED sign, the top half is bright yellow and the bottom half is bright green, with a white circle with a black arrow inside on the left side, a red square with the number eight in white in the middle, and the word "Parking" in white on the right. A navy blue wall is seen on the right side, with a light glare coming from the round ceiling light in the white ceiling. On the right side of the wall, there is a top print of the corner of the view behind a bridge with a light blue sky. Below that is a print of a black billboard corner with the letter "D" in red and white outlining.
